name: EVERYTHING YOU KNOW IS WRONG (The Video Game)
name_original: EVERYTHING YOU KNOW IS WRONG (The Video Game)
description:
This something done on scratch BY ME!

CONTROLS AND STUFF:

Fight your way across the level, and find as many of the 35 ran-DUMB  objects-- just because.

(spikes cannot hurt you and you are also invincible, kind of like Deadpool.)

[Arrows or WASD] - Move               [Space or H] - Attack

[M] - Music On / Off.                      [P] - Pause On / Off

[T] - Throw (Shuriken/Pike once picked up)

Hold down to crouch, Tap down to drop through platforms.

Crouching for a second provides you with power for an extra long jumps or kick.
